H0.text: Driving large cars is a way of improving air quality.

H1.text: Building more factories is a way of improving air quality.

H2.text: Burning wood in the fireplace is a way of improving air quality.

H3.text: Using solar energy to produce electricity is a way of improving air quality.

A4.text: enhance sustainability, reduce pollution, lower the costs of mitigating global warming

A5.text: Solar chemical processes offset energy that would otherwise come from a fossil fuel source
